docs.title: Daily DevOps
docs.text:
🤖 Made with DevOps

This page will be automatically built and deployed to GitHub Page everyday without any human intervention. Therefore, the following joke and snake are daily renewed.

Laugh of the Day Why did the web developer walk out of a resturant in disgust?The seating was laid out in tables.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
CSS files with underscore _ are the compiled result from the extra_sass directory, which contains Bootstrap style. - For example, from the root of the repository:

sass docs/extra_sass/_buttons.scss docs/style/_buttons.css
  • Add the compiled file to mkdocs.yml/extra_css
